description:
My place is close to the subway as well as bars and restaurants! You’ll love my place because of Beautiful one bedroom with large office space in the heart of Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. The location, the people, & the ambiance. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The apt includes 1 bedroom & 1 office room/art studio, and is equipped with a spacious living room, eat in kitchen, large bathroom, & shared balcony.

Other features include:
Laundry on the premises
High Speed Wi-fi
HD TV with apple TV & local stations
Stereo system (surround sound)
Air Conditioning / Heating
24hr security cameras

You will have access to the full apartment for your stay.

My co-manager, Chris, will be there to check you in. He will also be available for any questions you have for the area and the space.

Located in the heart Bedford Stuyvesant Brooklyn, this lovely creative space is just moments away from the best restaurants, coffee shops, shopping & mass transit.

The closest train station is on Fulton Street & Nostrand Ave - A/C

The subway offers a quick ride to lower Manhattan. Additionally, Barclay’s Center where numerous concerts & sporting events are held is only 2 stops away via subway.

Please be aware that local corner Mosque in the area will pray times 5x throughout the day over a small speaker. The exact times vary by season but the approximate times are:

-630am
-11:40am
-2:30pm
-4:30pm
-6pm
name: Private 1 bed/office Brooklyn Apt
review: Great apartment, clean, cosy bed, Netflix, Wifi, grocery stores around the corner, C Train only 5 mins away.
